titles.title: I Just Want To Praise You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I just want to praise You,
Lift my hands and say I love You.
You are everything to me.
I exalt Your holy name.
I exalt Your holy name.
I exalt Your holy name on high.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Quiero alabarle,
alzar mis manos y decir Te amo,
eres todo para m√≠
/exaltar tu Santo Nombre/ (2)
Ensalzar tu Santo nombre en alto.
